mapper.insert: insert into item (ino, name, price, amount, content, photo, state) values (Item_seq.nextval, #{name} ,#{price}, #{amount}, #{content}, #{photo}, #{state})
insert into member_order (ono, giver, taker, item, cnt, addr) values(member_order_seq.nextval, #{giver}, #{taker}, #{item}, #{cnt}, #{addr})
mapper.select:
select ino, photo, name, price, amount, state from item
where name like '%'||#{search}||'%'
order by ino desc

select count(*) cnt from item
where name like '%'||#{search}||'%'
order by ino desc

select ino, photo, name, price, content from item
where name like '%'||#{name}||'%'
order by ino desc

choose.when: update member_order set state=1 where ono=#{ono}
choose.otherwise: update member_order set state=0 where ono=#{ono}

mapper.select:
select ono, giver, taker,(select id from member where no=giver) giverid, (select id from member where no=taker) takerid, (select name from item where ino=item) itemname, item, cnt, orderDate, state, addr from member_order
where giver
where taker
in (select no from member where id like '%'||#{search}||'%')
order by ono desc

select count(*) cnt from member_order
where giver
where taker
in (select no from member where id like '%'||#{search}||'%')
